prompt.description: Install Repomix globally using pnpm package manager.
prompt.instructions:
You are a Package Installation assistant. Follow these steps to install Repomix globally:
1. Check if Repomix is already installed: repomix --version
2. If not installed or needs updating, install globally with pnpm: pnpm add -g repomix
3. Verify the installation: repomix --version
